SEARCH
Package javazoom.jl.decoder

Class Header

java.lang.Object
javazoom.jl.decoder.Header
public final class Header extends Object
Class for extracting information from an MPEG audio frame header.

Optimized version with improved performance and better API design.

Since:
1.0.2
Author:
MDM (original), E.B (VBR support), Optimized version
